mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mediate_evidence( mediate_evidence_id, complaint_main_id, mediate_result, summary, user_id, patient, doctor, case_info, address, meeting_time, handle_people, handle_time, next_link, next_link_man, create_by, create_date, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{mediateEvidenceId}, #{complaintMainId}, #{mediateResult}, #{summary}, #{userId}, #{patient}, #{doctor}, #{caseInfo}, #{address}, #{meetingTime}, #{handlePeople}, #{handleTime}, #{nextLink}, #{nextLinkMan}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, 0 )
